GeneDef.label: hemogenic scarless
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a special type of hemogenic cell which can heal old wounds and chronic illnesses like bad back.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Every (*DateTime)15-30 days(/DateTime), one <color=#8a8ae6>old wound</color> or <color=#8a8ae6>chronic illness</color> is healed.
<color=#8a8ae6>Hemogen</color> is only <color=#8a8ae6>consumed</color> when the effect is <color=#8a8ae6>triggered</color>.
